Name: Hyper Storm
About the game: Hyper Storm is an arcade, thrilling shooter with backview. Defeat your enemies and compete for the best scores by controlling futuristic fighters that rush towards your enemies on a stage from ground to space. VR is supported and feedback motion data according to the fighter's movement or combat situation for the simulator is output to the UDP network. Support for SimTools plugins.
Meta Title: Hyper Storm: Oct 3, 2019, MotionHouse and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hyper Storm? Check out the release date (Oct 3, 2019), developer insights from MotionHouse, and a complete game summary.
